title: Is Eminem the fastest rapper out there? - Quora

response.answer_text: Eminem is undeniably a fast rapper, as anything over 10 sps is fairly rapid and Eminem hits 12.3 syllables per second from my calculations on his fastest verse, being speedom, but this would not even put him close to being the fastest rapper alive. I won’t mention people whose only goal is to go fast, like crucified or don xperto because they don’t make music they just make noise, but here are some rappers that can rap faster than Eminem that have very accessible music, as well as the songs they reach their peaks, in increasing order Logic is just as fast as Eminem, hitting 12.3 sps on his one-off, live-oriented verse, titled “Jack the Ripper,” though logic holds the speed for around 6 seconds as opposed to Eminem’s roughly 1.5 second burst Joyner Lucas - peak of 12.4 sps on the song “Sriracha,” other fast songs are his “Panda” remix on which he goes 10.3 sps, and his “Mask Off” remix, where he goes 10.1 sps Tech N9ne - peak of 12.7 sps on “Welcome To The Midwest,” other fast songs are “Taking Online Orders” on which he goes 11.7 sps, “Kill Shit” where he goes 10.7 sps, and “Get Off Me” where he goes 11.8 sps Busta Rhymes - peak of 12.8 sps on the song “Hello,” other fast songs are “60 Second Assassins” where i calculated 11.8 sps and “Why Stop Now” where i calculated 10.5 sps Twista - peak of 12.8 sps on the song “Victory or Death,” other fast songs are “60 Second Assassins” in which he goes 11.5 sps, and “Mista Tung Twista”, where he goes 11.2 sps KAAN - peak of 13 sps on “NCS,” other fast songs are “Rick Rolled” on which he goes 11 sps and “The Dude” where he goes 11.5 sps Token - Peak of 13 sps on “Self Taught,” though i haven’t calculated any other fast Token verses in terms of peak, probably his fastest over a long period of time is Doozy, where he spits around 165 syllables in 16 seconds, 8 syllables more in same amount of time as Rap God Tonedeff - 14 sps on “Crispy,” I’m unaware of any of the numbers on his other songs though on the song “Demon” he spits 165 syllables in in 16 seconds, the same speed as token on doozy and 8 syllables more than Rap God in the same amount of time And Finally, Twisted Insane - at a whopping 15.6 sps on the song “Dome Split,” other fast songs are “100 Round Clip,” where he goes around 14.1 sps, and “Brainsick 1.0” where he goes around 15 sps. Another sidenote is on the song “100 Round Clip,” he spits 161 syllables in 16 seconds, faster than Rap God, and averages 10 sps over 50 seconds on the first verse of the Chop Shop, as compared to Rap God on which he only averages 9.6 over 16 seconds. There are others that go faster than these, but these are just a few who make good content and I enjoy. Even then I think only about 3 or 4 out of these 9 rappers can compete with Eminem lyrically (KAAN, Logic, Tech N9ne, and Joyner specifically), and Eminem definitely can rap fast, but he’s nowhere near the peak of some other rappers.

I would agree to the statement cause I don't thing any other rapper has the ability to connect words , make them rhyme in such a way to make it look simple (but it isn't, I've tried :( , not to forget his lung capacity to be able to NOT take in a single breath inbetween.
